definitions.definition: Collectively, personal ornamentation such as rings , necklaces , brooches and bracelets , made of precious metals and sometimes set with gemstones .
examples: She had more jewellery ornamented about her than any three ladies needed.

definitions.definition: Any tools, instruments, devices, etc., placed within a drill pipe .
The shop from which a jeweller trades or makes jewellery

main_definition: Collectively, personal ornamentation such as rings , necklaces , brooches and bracelets , made of precious metals and sometimes set with gemstones .
secondary_definitions: ( oil industry , informal ) Any tools, instruments, devices, etc., placed within a drill pipe .
The shop from which a jeweller trades or makes jewellery
